page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT AROUND STOTTESDON
page.content: More people in this area are engaged in{agriculture}than any other single occupation, but this is only 1/4 of people over 16. 80% of those so occupied are self employed or members of the farmer's family; there are few farm workers' jobs. Nearly all the farms have 2 or more tractors (av. 3). 50% of farms use contractors for some work eg. silaging, harvesting, hedge cutting, shearing. The contractor may be another farmer with the necessary machinery. Farmers prefer to rely as little as possible on outsiders. {Other employers}in the block are the 2 pubs & the school. 50% of earners are full or part time {self-employed}people working mostly from home at many varied jobs such as building, shopkeeping, graphic design, cooking, cleaning, hairdressing, etc. (cont...
